class.name: AudioEffectChorus
class.brief_description: Adds a chorus audio effect to an audio bus. Gives the impression of multiple audio sources.
class.description: A "chorus" effect creates multiple copies of the original audio (called "voices") with variations in pitch, and layers on top of the original, giving the impression that the sound comes from multiple sources. This creates spectral and spatial movement. Each voice is played a short period of time after the original audio, controlled by [code]delay[/code]. An internal low-frequency oscillator (LFO) controls their pitch, and [code]depth[/code] controls the LFO's maximum amount. In the real world, this kind of effect is found in pianos, choirs, and instrument ensembles. This effect can also be used to widen mono audio and make digital sounds have a more natural or analog quality.

method.name: get_voice_cutoff_hz
method.description: Returns the frequency threshold of a given [param voice_idx]'s low-pass filter in Hz. Frequencies above this value are removed from the voice.

method.name: get_voice_delay_ms
method.description: Returns the delay of a given [param voice_idx] in milliseconds, compared to the original audio.

method.name: get_voice_depth_ms
method.description: Returns the depth of a given [param voice_idx]'s low-frequency oscillator in milliseconds.

method.name: get_voice_level_db
method.description: Returns the gain of a given [param voice_idx] in dB.

method.name: get_voice_pan
method.description: Returns the pan position of a given [param voice_idx]. Negative values mean the left channel, positive mean the right.

method.name: get_voice_rate_hz
method.description: Returns the rate of a given [param voice_idx]'s low-frequency oscillator in Hz.

method.name: set_voice_cutoff_hz
method.description: Sets the frequency threshold of a given [param voice_idx]'s low-pass filter in Hz. Frequencies above [param cutoff_hz] are removed from [param voice_idx]. Value can range from 1 to 20500.

method.name: set_voice_delay_ms
method.description: Sets the delay of a given [param voice_idx] in milliseconds, compared to the original audio. Value can range from 0 to 50.

method.name: set_voice_depth_ms
method.description: Sets the depth of a given [param voice_idx]'s low-frequency oscillator in milliseconds. Value can range from 0 to 20.

method.name: set_voice_level_db
method.description: Sets the gain of a given [param voice_idx] in dB. Value can range from -60 to 24.

method.name: set_voice_pan
method.description: Sets the pan position of a given [param voice_idx]. Negative values pan the sound to the left, positive pan to the right. Value can range from -1 to 1.

method.name: set_voice_rate_hz
method.description: Sets the rate of a given [param voice_idx]'s low-frequency oscillator in Hz. Value can range from 0.1 to 20.
